job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to refining or enhancing the AI model's performance, which falls under the core definition of modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: Providing feedback on AI outputs and participating in fine-tuning sessions are direct activities involved in model improvement and adaptation.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and testing new AI approaches are integral to the process of developing and evaluating models.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support
job_tasks.justification: This phrase implies building or integrating AI capabilities into a system or workflow to deliver a service, which is a software development task.

soft_skills.phrase: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short
ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

classification.rationale: The role heavily emphasizes improving and fine-tuning AI systems, integrating AI capabilities into customer support, and prototyping new AI tools, aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer. While there's mention of 'improving the AI system,' which could touch on MLOps, the primary focus is on the generative AI aspect and its application.
